TopicTitle: Trying to find MechJeb but forum links don't work anymore.

Articles.Content: The title pretty much says it all. I haven't used MechJeb but I really wanted to use Damned Robotics and I need MechJeb to make that work. Unfortunately I cannot find it anywhere and any google searches that come up with the forum don't work due to the migration. Thanks a ton for the help/download link!
look inside addon releases, and then the plugin-powered subforum.
